data.text: @tashatheranter Hello Tasha, Air France and KLM have permanently made the switch to Terminal 3 to enjoy better connections with our partners. Best Regards, Yvonne
@tnmythkr88 Hello Tanmay, to understand your situation and in order to assist you in the best possible way, may you contact us in DM with your booking number please? Thank you, Yvonne
@KristaFroess Hi Krista, to obtain information on the status of your baggage, we invite you to use our online tracing tool. We will do our best to deliver your baggage asap. Yvonne
@philhowells70 Hello Phil, self check-in kiosks are located within the departures areas of Terminals 1, 2 and 3. Regards Yvonne

data.text:
@Tryhard18116200 Hello, we regret this incident at the arrival of your flight. Did you already make your loss report online or at the airport?  We remain at your disposal in private if needed. Yvonne

https://t.co/Yb1ur8ZfLK

data.text:
@OdotTdot Dear @OdotTdot, in order to assist you in the best possible way to refund your vouchers, can you please indicate the reference number of your file by private message on Messenger (for Facebook) or by DM (on Twitter)? 
Thank you, Yvonne

@KristaFroess Hello @KristaFroess, we would like to reassure you by confirming that when you fill out your form, you do not receive an acknowledgement of receipt. There is no need to repeat the procedure, your request will be processed as soon as possible. Have a good day, Yvonne
@MOURDI_ZOUHEYR Dear @MOURDI_ZOUHEYR, you can add extra baggage via "my booking". If you need any further help, we remain available in DM. Thank you, Yvonne

@sassys8n Dear Kristen, we understand your dissatisfaction; We would like to inform that, any baggage irregularities are handled by the baggage service team. Therefore, we will not be able to provide you with an update of your baggage via this platform. Thanks for your understanding,Yvonne

data.text:
@_littlem0nsterx Hello Keyra, if you require specific assistance with your refund request, we invite you to contact our customer support team on Facebook Messenger or Twitter (DM) with your booking number please! 
Have a great day, Yvonne

@lekanoshunkoya Hi Olalekan, unfortunately we can't obtain information on the status of your baggage via social networks. Therefore, we invite you to use our online tracing tool. We will do our best to deliver your baggage asap. Yvonne

@KristaFroess Hi Krista, if you have incurred basic expenses due to the absence of your baggage, you can submit your reimbursement request. Please fill out the reimbursement form online. Make sure to keep all your receipts, as you may be asked to submit them. Yvonne

@kirti_chhatwal Hello Kirti, we regret this incident at the arrival of your flight. Did you make your loss report online? 
We remain at your disposal if needed. Good day, Yvonne

@sassys8n Dear Kristen, we're so sorry for the delay but unfortunately we can advise you with further information on social networks. Did you already submit claim on our website for delayed baggage? Regards, Yvonne
 
https://t.co/zXT5lfE4Xk
RT @nationalrailenq: RMT, TSSA and Unite strike action is taking place across certain parts of the network tomorrow, so please only travel…

data.text: @reelsophiec Hello Sophie, as of March 2020, the meal options have not been available due to the current health situation. We hope to resume starting in 2023.

@sc_iam_ Hello @sc_iam_, we regret but we cannot inform you differently as baggage is handled by the baggage service team. Kindly communicate with them for further assistance. We remain available if needed. Yvonne

@alexlatattoos Hello Alex, we're sincerely sorry for this situation and apologise. In order to assist you in the best possible way, can you please indicate more by private message please? 
Thank you!

urls.title: Bagage manquant ou endommagé | Air France
urls.description: Air France vous indique comment procéder si votre bagage ne vous a pas été restitué à l'aéroport d'arrivée. Vos bagages ont été endommagés au cours d'un vol ? Air France vous conseille et vous informe.

data.text:
@Lauloves86 Hello Lauren, we regret this incident at the arrival of your flight. Did you make your loss report online via https://t.co/3hkfTenx5h 
We remain at your disposal in private messaging if needed. Yvonne

@TimmyLUHG Dear Timmy, we are very sorry for any delays encountered in the processing of your claim. If your message concerns a refund or a voucher request, we invite you to view the current information of your file on the page: https://t.co/KRGWPEKmyk
Thank you.

@lekanoshunkoya Hello Olalekan, we are sorry to hear that you have not received your luggage yet. Unfortunately, we are unable to help you via social media. Have you already been able to create a claim for compensation* online based on the value provided? Yvonne

@chelsperryy Hello @chelsperryy, 
We are sorry you haven't been able to reach us on the phone. We are very busy at the moment. If you still need help, please drop us a DM with as much info as possible. We will then try to assist you. Guillaume
@justinpreston20 Hello Justin, we answered you in a private message. If need any further support, let us know please! Thank you

@justinpreston20 Dear Justin, we apologise for the delay. Upon checking, we see that your claim was well received by our Customer Care team. Due to the high volume of requests they have received in the last few months, they are currently unable to adhere to on their normal response time. Yvonne

data.text: @laughsnbants_ Dear Kona, please find the link below to ask for a compensation. We remain at your disposal if needed: https://t.co/OlEI8saAdb
@laughsnbants_ Hi Kona, to obtain information on the status of your baggage, we invite you to use our online tracing tool. We will do our best to deliver your baggage asap. Yvonne

@cmille101 Hello Christo, we are really sorry for this delay. We would like to reassure you that all claims will be issued. Can you communicate us your booking number via DM please? We will transfer your request for priority treatment. Yvonne

@sjke222 Hello Sarah, to obtain information on the status of your baggage, we invite you to use our online tracing tool. Please don't contact our customer service as they are unable to provide you with any further information. We will do our best to deliver your baggage asap. Yvonne
